[[https://rommelalonzo.bitbucket.org/skinsim/|{{http://rommelalonzo.bitbucket.org/images/skinsim_logo.png|SkinSim Website}}]]

SkinSim is a multi-modal skin simulation environment based on the Gazebo simulator. It provides functionality for building robot models with robotic skin attached and near real-time realistic skin simulation.


**[[https://bitbucket.org/rommelAlonzo/skinsim_rommel/downloads|Download]]**

==Versioning==
Semanitc versioning 2.0.0 is used in SkinSim. See:**[[http://semver.org|Semver]]**

* Current Version: 0.1.0
